quotes: In January 2015 he travelled to the Saudi capital Riyadh to pay his respects, following the death of the nation's King Abdullah.
He stated that, if this investigation was not completed by March 2014, he would press for an independent international inquiry.

In a speech in Ankara in July 2010, Cameron stated unequivocally his support for Turkey's accession to the EU, citing economic, security and political considerations, and claimed that those who opposed Turkish membership were driven by 'protectionism, narrow nationalism or prejudice'.
Cameron was the first foreign leader to visit Jaffna since the island once colonised by Britain became independent in 1948.

quotes: According to WikiLeaks, Cameron initiated a secret deal with Saudi Arabia, ensuring both countries were elected onto the UN Human Rights Council.

roles.title: foreign leader
quotes: Cameron was the first foreign leader to visit Jaffna since the island once colonised by Britain became independent in 1948.
(right) outside 10 Downing Street Cameron supported Britain's close relationship with Saudi Arabia.
In January 2015 he travelled to the Saudi capital Riyadh to pay his respects, following the death of the nation's King Abdullah.
Sri Lanka Cameron reiterated calls for an independent investigation into the alleged war crimes during the final stages of the Sri Lankan Civil War.

This followed a visit to Jaffna, a war-ravaged town in the northern part of Sri Lanka; Cameron was the first foreign leader to visit Jaffna since the island once colonised by Britain became independent in 1948.

In a speech in Ankara in July 2010, Cameron stated unequivocally his support for Turkey's accession to the EU, citing economic, security and political considerations, and claimed that those who opposed Turkish membership were driven by 'protectionism, narrow nationalism or prejudice'.
